name: Anish Wagle

experiences.description: Transitioned to a full-time role after completing an internship. Focused on Python development for embedded systems, IoT solutions, and mobile app development.
Contributed to projects involving Raspberry Pi, Flask-based web development, and mobile applications using Java and C/C++.

education.degree: M Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: IoT-based Greenhouse Management System
projects.description: Automated environmental monitoring and control for greenhouses using sensors and actuators, ensuring optimal conditions for plant growth.

projects.title: Performance Testing of Relational and Non-relational Databases
projects.description: Conducted performance analysis of MySQL and MongoDB using JMeter, benchmarking their scalability under varying workloads.

certifications: Google Project Management: Foundations of Project Management (2021)
